author: Wallaceohana "Faye L. Wallace"

review: I really like this device.  I have had a hard time with Comcast and I got this. Love that I can stream channels on this.  Now that Sling TV is out, I can watch regular TV after work with a lot of great channels.  The channels are getting better.  Wish I could get HBO or Showtime.  You have to have cable or dish service already in order to utilize those channels through the ROKU.  That's kind of the point - this is our new service.  I am sure they will have a solution soon.

review: Apple TV is better.  I have been very disappointed in the Roku.
author: sus.brooks

review: This is my first Roku, the Roku sticks looks and works great. I had no problem setting up my TV with the Roku stick. The directions for installing and setting up the system was easy and I had no problems with adding the channels I watch. If you already have cable, you can add channels like the History channel and log into your cable account to access it thru  Roku. I am happy with my purchase and the package was received on time.
